description: Details required by condition 2 (submission of details) of listed building consent 20/01196  (External changes: at Lower Ground Floor (excavation to create full-width lower ground rear extension); at Ground Floor (garden will be created in place of the existing concrete slab lightwell; recently added rear French doors will be replaced with new patio windows); Existing central lightwell will be rebuilt - the tall contemporary glass enclosing the external lightwell will be removed while the existing atrium will be retained with the glass roof above extended to the party wall; Internal changes: at Lower Ground Floor (original walls of lower ground floor closet wing extension will be reinstated; fire curtain will be incorporated in the proposed reception room); at Ground Floor (existing extension will be redesigned internally))
